title: Instruction Book, 1983-63-1, 1835
inscribed: Title: "Simple directions in needlework and cutting out; intended for the use of the National Female Schools of Ireland. To which are added specimens of work executed by the pupils of the National Model Female School" Dublin: Printed by William Holden, Hibernia Press Office, Temple-Lane.1835 this stamp on title page "National School Training Depaertment".
creditline: Gift of The Cleveland Museum of Art
